com.wisper.cli

Class CLIParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.wisper.cli.CLIParser

  • public class CLIParser
extends java.lang.Object
    Parses an argument-array in the given environment
    Author:
    Tobias Marstaller

      • getInstance

        public static CLIParser getInstance(java.io.InputStream configInputStream)
                             throws org.xml.sax.SAXException,
                                    java.io.IOException,
                                    ParseException
        Parses the configuration-xml from configInputStream and returns an configured parser.
        Parameters:
        configInputStream - A stream to read the configuration from.
        Returns:
        A parser configured according to the configuration read from configInputStream.
        Throws:
        org.xml.sax.SAXException - If an XML Syntax-Error occurs.
        java.io.IOException - If an I/O-Error occurs.
        ParseException - If a semantic error occurs while parsing the xml.
